metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5685 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The lazy_bdecode function in BitTorrent DHT bootstrap server (bootstrap-dht ) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet, related to "improper indexing."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtorrent-rasterbar8 - 1.0.7-1build1
python-libtorrent - 1.0.7-1build1
python3-libtorrent - 1.0.7-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.7-1build1').
